languages.text: "О, Ваша Светлость, если это именно то, о чем я думаю..." {n}Высокий фактотум задумчиво складывает руки на животе.{/n} "Когда-то в семейной библиотеке я наткнулся на один том о древних ритуалах нобилите... кажется, оттуда я запомнил термин старинного этикета нобилите — "имморталиум", или "бессмертный цветок", способный столетия обитать в пустоте космоса. Дозвольте полюбопытствовать, кто вам его отправил?"

traits.locale_text: "О, Ваша Светлость, если это именно то, о чем я думаю..." {n}Высокий Фактотум задумчиво складывает руки на животе.{/n} "Когда-то в семейной библиотеке я наткнулся на один том о древних ритуалах нобилите... кажется, оттуда я запомнил термин старинного этикета нобилите — "имморталиум", или "бессмертный цветок", способный столетия обитать в пустоте космоса. Дозвольте полюбопытствовать, кто вам его отправил?"

languages.text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if this is what I think it is..." {n}Janris ponderously rests his arms on his bulging stomach.{/n} "I once came across a volume on ancient aristocratic rituals in the family library... I think I recall something called an 'immortalium,' a term from an ancient custom of the nobility. An 'eternal flower' that can exist for centuries in the vastness of space. May I enquire who sent it to you?"
languages.original_text: "О, Ваша Светлость, если это именно то, о чем я думаю..." {n}Высокий фактотум задумчиво складывает руки на животе.{/n} "Когда-то в семейной библиотеке я наткнулся на один том о древних ритуалах нобилите... кажется, оттуда я запомнил термин старинного этикета нобилите — "имморталиум", или "бессмертный цветок", способный столетия обитать в пустоте космоса. Дозвольте полюбопытствовать, кто вам его отправил?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if this is what I am thinking about..." {n}Janris ponderously rests his arms on the bulging stomach.{/n} "A long time ago I came across a volume on the ancient Nobilite rituals in the family library... I think I recall something called 'Immortalium', a term for an ancient custom of the Nobilite. An 'imperishable flower' that can exist for centuries in the vastness of space. May I inquire who sent it to you?"

I think I recall something called 'Immortalium', a term for an ancient custom of the Nobilite. An 'imperishable flower' that can exist for centuries in the vastness of space. May I inquire who sent it to you?"

I think I recall something called 'Immortalium,' a term from an ancient custom of the Nobilite. An 'imperishable flower' that can exist for centuries in the vastness of space. I think I recall something called 'Immortalium,' a term from an ancient custom of the Nobilite. An 'imperishable flower' that can exist for centuries in the vastness of space. I think I recall something called an 'immortalium,' a term from an ancient custom of the nobility. An 'eternal flower' that can exist for centuries in the vastness of space. "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if this is what I think it is..." {n}Janris ponderously rests his arms on his bulging stomach.{/n} "I once came across a volume on ancient aristocratic rituals in the family library... I think I recall something called an 'immortalium,' a term from an ancient custom of the nobility. An 'eternal flower' that can exist for centuries in the vastness of space. May I enquire who sent it to you?"

languages.text: "Oh, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, wenn es sich dabei um das handelt, was ich denke ..." {n}Janris legt nachdenklich die Arme auf seinen prallen Bauch.{/n} "Ich habe einmal in der Familienbibliothek in einem Werk über alte Rituale des Adels geblättert ... Ich erinnere mich an etwas, das 'Immortalium' hieß, ein Begriff aus einem alten Brauch der Nobilite. Eine 'ewige Blume', die Jahrhunderte in den Weiten des Weltraums überdauern kann. Darf ich fragen, wer sie Euch geschickt hat?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if this is what I think it is..." {n}Janris ponderously rests his arms on his bulging stomach.{/n} "I once came across a volume on ancient aristocratic rituals in the family library... I think I recall something called an 'immortalium,' a term from an ancient custom of the nobility. An 'eternal flower' that can exist for centuries in the vastness of space. May I enquire who sent it to you?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, wenn es sich dabei um das handelt, was ich denke ..." {n}Janris legt nachdenklich die Arme auf seinen prallen Bauch.{/n} "Ich habe einmal in der Familienbibliothek in einem Werk über alte Rituale der Nobilite geblättert ... Ich erinnere mich an etwas, das 'Immortalium' hieß, ein Begriff aus einem alten Brauch der Nobilite. Eine 'unvergängliche Blume', die Jahrhunderte in den Weiten des Weltraums überdauern kann. Darf ich fragen, wer sie Euch geschickt hat?"

languages.text: « Oh, Votre Seigneurie, s'il s'agit bien de ce que je pense... » {n}Janris repose lourdement ses bras croisés sur son ventre protubérant.{/n} « Un jour, je suis tombé sur un ouvrage traitant de vieux rituels et coutumes aristocratiques, dans la bibliothèque familiale... Je me rappelle avoir lu quelque chose à propos de ce qu'ils appelaient "l'immortalium", une "fleur éternelle" qui peut continuer d'exister pendant des siècles dans le vide de l'espace. Puis-je vous demander qui vous l'a fait parvenir ? »
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if this is what I think it is..." {n}Janris ponderously rests his arms on his bulging stomach.{/n} "I once came across a volume on ancient aristocratic rituals in the family library... I think I recall something called an 'immortalium,' a term from an ancient custom of the nobility. An 'eternal flower' that can exist for centuries in the vastness of space. May I enquire who sent it to you?"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, Votre Seigneurie, s'il s'agit bien de ce que je pense... » {n}Janris repose lourdement ses bras croisés sur son ventre protubérant.{/n} « Un jour, je suis tombé sur un ouvrage traitant de vieux rituels et coutumes de la Navis Nobilite, dans la bibliothèque familiale... Je me rappelle avoir lu quelque chose à propos de ce qu'ils appelaient l'"immortalium", une "fleur immortelle" qui peut continuer d'exister pendant des siècles dans le vide de l'espace. Puis-je vous demander qui vous l'a fait parvenir ? »

languages.text: “噢，大人，如果我没想错的话……”{n}詹里斯沉思着，双手抱着圆滚滚的肚子。{/n}“之前在家族图书馆中，我读到过关于古代贵族仪式的书……我记得，这种东西应该是叫做‘永生花’，这是某种古老的贵族习俗。一朵永生花可以在浩瀚的太空中存活几百年之久。如果您不介意的话，可以冒昧地问一下，这件礼物是谁送给您的吗？”
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if this is what I think it is..." {n}Janris ponderously rests his arms on his bulging stomach.{/n} "I once came across a volume on ancient aristocratic rituals in the family library... I think I recall something called an 'immortalium,' a term from an ancient custom of the nobility. An 'eternal flower' that can exist for centuries in the vastness of space. May I enquire who sent it to you?"

traits.locale_text: “噢，大人，如果我没想错的话……”{n}詹里斯沉思着，双手抱着圆滚滚的肚子。{/n}“之前在家族图书馆中，我读到过关于古代贵族仪式的书……我记得，这种东西应该是叫做‘永生花’，这是某种古老的贵族习俗。一朵永生花可以在浩瀚的太空中存活几百年之久。如果您不介意的话，可以冒昧地问一下，这件礼物是谁送给您的吗？”

languages.text: 「ああ陛下、私の予想通りあれば…」{n}ジャンリスは重々しい様子で、膨れた腹の上で腕組みをする。{/n}「かつて、一家の図書館で古の貴族の儀式について書かれた本を読んだことがあるのです…。確か、“イモータリウム”は、貴族たちのいにしえの慣習に関する言葉だったかと。広大な宇宙で、何世紀にもわたり存在する『不滅の花』。誰から送られたものか伺ってもよろしいでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if this is what I think it is..." {n}Janris ponderously rests his arms on his bulging stomach.{/n} "I once came across a volume on ancient aristocratic rituals in the family library... I think I recall something called an 'immortalium,' a term from an ancient custom of the nobility. An 'eternal flower' that can exist for centuries in the vastness of space. May I enquire who sent it to you?"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、陛下、これは私の考え通りであれば…」{n}ジャンリスは重々しい様子で、膨れた腹の上で腕組みをする。{/n}「かつて、一家の図書館で古の貴族の儀式について書かれた本を読んだことがあるのです…。確か、”イモ―タリウム”は、貴族の古の慣習に関する言葉だったかと。広大な宇宙で、何世紀にもわたり存在する”不滅の花”。誰から送られたのか伺ってもよろしいでしょうか？」

languages.text: «Oh, {mf|milord|milady}, si esto es lo que creo que es...». {n}Janris apoya pesadamente sus brazos en su abultada barriga.{/n} «Una vez encontré un volumen sobre antiguos rituales aristocráticos en la biblioteca de la familia... Creo recordar algo llamado "inmortalium", un término de una antigua costumbre de la nobleza. Una "flor eterna" que puede existir durante siglos en la inmensidad del espacio. ¿Le importa que le pregunte quién se lo envió?».
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if this is what I think it is..." {n}Janris ponderously rests his arms on his bulging stomach.{/n} "I once came across a volume on ancient aristocratic rituals in the family library... I think I recall something called an 'immortalium,' a term from an ancient custom of the nobility. An 'eternal flower' that can exist for centuries in the vastness of space. May I enquire who sent it to you?"

traits.locale_text: «Oh, {mf|milord|milady}, si esto es lo que creo que es...». {n}Janris apoya pesadamente sus brazos en su abultada barriga.{/n} «Una vez encontré un volumen sobre antiguos rituales de la Nobilite en la biblioteca de la familia... Creo recordar algo llamado "inmortalium", un término de una antigua costumbre de la Nobilite. Una "flor imperecedera" que puede existir durante siglos en la inmensidad del espacio. ¿Le importa que le pregunte quién se lo envió?».

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bu düşündüğüm şeyse..." {n}Janris, kollarını ağır ağır şişkin karnına dayıyor.{/n} "Bir keresinde aile kütüphanesinde eski aristokrat âdetleri üzerine bir kitaba rastlamıştım. 'İmmortalium' diye bir ifade hatırlıyorum, eski bir soylu âdeti olması lazım. Uçsuzlukta yüzyıllarca var olabilen 'ebedî bir çiçek'... Bunu size kimin gönderdiğini sorabilir miyim?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if this is what I think it is..." {n}Janris ponderously rests his arms on his bulging stomach.{/n} "I once came across a volume on ancient aristocratic rituals in the family library... I think I recall something called an 'immortalium,' a term from an ancient custom of the nobility. An 'eternal flower' that can exist for centuries in the vastness of space. May I enquire who sent it to you?"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bu düşündüğüm şeyse..." {n}Janris kollarını ağır ağır şişkin karnına dayıyor.{/n} "Bir keresinde aile kütüphanesinde eski aristokrat âdetleri üzerine bir kitaba rastlamıştım. 'İmmortalium' diye bir ifade hatırlıyorum, eski bir soylu âdeti olması lazım. Uçsuzlukta yüzyıllarca var olabilen 'ebedî bir çiçek'... Bunu size kimin gönderdiğini sorabilir miyim?"
